name: GoPlanit
tag_list: techcrunch50, tc50, travel, trip-planner, mobile, 1-click-planner, calendar, recommendation-engine, travel-microblogging, plan, plans, plan-it, plan-your-trip-and-go, mobile-trip-planning, travel-microblog
overview:
GoPlanit is the one-click travel planner thatâ€™s useful on the go.

Travel planning can be very frustrating and time-consuming. One can spend weeks or even months researching details, organizing travel plans, and communicating with friends, family, and other travelers. GoPlanit helps simplify the above process- saving you time, money, and aggravation when you’re planning your trips.

GoPlanitâ€™s one-click travel planner creates a custom trip itinerary for you at the click of a button. This recommendation engine uses proprietary algorithms to build out your trip, taking into account your personal preferences, friendsâ€™ recommendations and each itemâ€™s popularity, rating, location, hours of operation and more.

With GoPlanit mobile, you can access your itinerary and search for nearby things to do and see. GoPlanitâ€™s travel micro-blogging feature also allows you to easily update your trip journal with text, pictures, and item ratings from your mobile in real-time, keeping others following your trip up to date at all times.

GoPlanit helps you with your travel planning every step of the way - before, during, and after your trip.
